title.rendered: Let’s hope for a real estate boom in case NHAI constructs two-layer elevated road from Dhaula Kuan to Manesar

content.rendered:
This is an open secret that increasing traffic mess between the national capital and Gurugram is a matter of serious concern for the governments at Centre and state as well as for every common man. The international airport is close to Gurugram and this city hosts more than 250 Fortune 500 companies and it is the house of IT hubs and automobile and garment as well as and thereby this city is India’s top job providing city. The real estate sector of gurugram is known to the world inviting investors from across the world. In the given scenario, the latest news that the Roads Highways and Transport Ministry of India has shown interest in building a two-layer elevated road between Dhaula Kuan and Manesar is not surprising since it is the need of the time to decongest the traffic –long distance and local. For smooth business conduct the smooth traffic is a must.


Let’s keep our fingers crossed, the national highways authority of India (NHAI) finds the DPR feasible since the project’s feasibility study will be conducted in view of future traffic projections for the next 25 years. However, the NHAI has its reservation in the project’s feasibility study that the elevated road may have some conflict with the airport management.  


The Haryana government is building Global City in Gurugram and it will attract global attention and investors. The government is expecting the population to cross the figure of forty-five lakh over the next five to seven years. Urban Gurugram is expanding day by day with the need of housing and jobs and businesses. People from NCR prefer Gurugram for job point of view and permanent settlement of view as well. Dwarka expressway is soon to be opened to traffic, the RRTS (a rail project) is under construction, intra-city metro to connect old and new Gurugram is under consideration, KMP and DMIC and Sohna Alwar highways are bonafide reasons behind real estate boom and now two-layer elevate road from Dhaula Kuan to Manesar will expedite the development growth.     


It is the perfect time to invest in properties such as land, plots, flats and SCOs in Gurugram. City’s most trustworthy real estate promoter Signature Global has passed testimony of the city’s property buyers by delivering the units – commercial and residential both – and can be trusted for high returns.
